TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpRuntime extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a set of ASP.NET run-time services for the current application.

span.span: Provides a set of ASP.NET run-time services for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件用在處理 HTTP 要求的 ASP.NET 管線模型開始。The object is used at the beginning of the ASP.NET pipeline model that processes HTTP requests. 方法磁碟機的所有後續的 ASP.NET Web 處理。The method drives all subsequent ASP.NET Web processing. 網頁程式開發人員可以使用類別屬性，以了解目前的應用程式定義域的相關資訊供診斷之用，例如。Page developers can use the class properties to find out information about the current application domain for diagnostic purposes, for example. 建立自訂的處理程序管線或自訂的裝載環境的開發人員應該呼叫方法，從類別衍生自或類別。Developers creating custom process pipeline or a custom hosting environment should call the method from a class derived from the or class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得屬性類別代表目前的應用程式定義域，並在瀏覽器中顯示它們。The following example demonstrates how to get properties of the class representing the current application domain and display them to the browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebHttpRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebHttpRuntime/CS/systemwebhttpruntime.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebHttpRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebHttpRuntime/VB/systemwebhttpruntime.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppDomainAppId As String
public: static property System::String ^ AppDomainAppId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the application identification of the application domain where the exists.

span.span: Gets the application identification of the application domain where the exists.

value.span: 應用程式的應用程式定義域識別其中存在。

span.span: The application identification of the application domain where the exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AppDomainAppID` 可唯一識別應用程式。`AppDomainAppID` uniquely identifies the application. 它不會變更之後重新啟動應用程式，以及建立新的應用程式定義域。It does not change after the application is restarted and a new application domain is created.

public: static property System::String ^ AppDomainAppPath { System::String ^ get(); };

value.span: 目前的應用程式定義域裡裝載應用程式的應用程式目錄的實體磁碟機路徑。

span.span: The physical drive path of the application directory for the application hosted in the current application domain.

public: static property System::String ^ AppDomainAppVirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the virtual path of the directory that contains the application hosted in the current application domain.

value.span: 包含目前的應用程式定義域裡裝載應用程式的目錄虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path of the directory that contains the application hosted in the current application domain.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppDomainId As String
public: static property System::String ^ AppDomainId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the domain identification of the application domain where the instance exists.

span.span: Gets the domain identification of the application domain where the instance exists.

value.span: 唯一的應用程式定義域識別項。

span.span: The unique application domain identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AppDomainID` 每當重新啟動應用程式，並建立新的應用程式定義域時，就會變更。`AppDomainID` changes whenever the application is restarted and a new application domain is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 該版本包含的主要版本和次要版本;比方說，7.0、 7.5、 8.0、 等等。The version includes major version and minor version; for example, 7.0, 7.5, 8.0, etc.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TargetFramework As Version
public: static property Version ^ TargetFramework { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the version of the .NET Framework that the current web application targets.

span.span: Gets the version of the .NET Framework that the current web application targets.

value.span: 目前 web 應用程式之目標的.NET framework 版本。

span.span: The version of the .NET Framework that the current web application targets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常使用來設定`targetFramework`屬性的`httpRuntime`Web.config 檔案中的項目。This property is normally set by using the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element in the Web.config file. 這個屬性不保證傳回正確的值，如果 currentapplication 網域不是 ASP.NET 應用程式定義域。This property is not guaranteed to return a correct value if the currentapplication domain is not an ASP.NET application domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UnloadAppDomain() cil managed

summary.span: Terminates the current application.

span.span: Terminates the current application.

summary.span: The application restarts the next time a request is received for it.

span.span: The application restarts the next time a request is received for it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnloadAppDomain` 可用於具有大量不常收到要求的應用程式的伺服器。`UnloadAppDomain` is useful for servers that have a large number of applications that infrequently receive requests. 而不是保持應用程式資源的程序的存留期內保持運作`UnloadAppDomain`允許以程式設計方式關閉未使用的應用程式。Rather than keep application resources alive for the lifetime of the process, `UnloadAppDomain` allows programmatic shutdown of unused applications.

public: static property bool UsingIntegratedPipeline { bool get(); };

value.span: 如果應用程式正以 integrated 管線模式中執行否則， 。

span.span: if the application is running in integrated-pipeline mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Integrated 管線模式不適用於 IIS 的版本比[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]。Integrated-pipeline mode is not available in versions of IIS earlier than [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].
